group_1.narration: "When winter comes, spring isn't far behind"
I learned the meaning of this phrase @sometime at the end of last December.
It was just before New Year's Eve, and I was worried.

group_1.textCenter: Hey, does anyone have plans for New Year's Eve?

group_1.textRight: I don't think I've got anything planned...

group_1.textLeft: Nothing on my side either... What's up?

group_1.textRight: Well, since it's winter break and allâ€”
I thought it'd be great if we could all go somewhere together.

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, sounds good!
True, it's winter vacation after all.
However... there are witches to deal with.
It might be hard for everyone to leave Mitakihara @at once.

group_1.textRight: Hey, no need for a field trip just @'cause it's New Year's.
Best bet is to lounge around the house all day.

group_1.textLeft: Aah... then just like this year, next year we won't be able to go anywhere either.
Oh, a message...
From Kyousuke?

group_1.narration: "So, about New Year's Eve, @wanna go together to our @first shrine visit of the year?"

group_1.textLeft: .....[chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200401:cheek_1][chara:200401:motion_400][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]No way!
Umm...
Kyousuke just invited me to go to our first shrine @visit of the year...
He says we can offer our greetings too...
Well, we're childhood friends, so it's normal @to go to our first shrine visit together...

group_1.textRight: Since it's a special occasion, how about wearing a haregi?

group_1.textLeft: H-Haregi...?

group_1.textRight: I think it's a great idea.
After all, New Year's Eve is basically your only @chance to wear one.

group_1.textLeft: Now hold on, wouldn't that be too much?
We're only gonna offer our greetings...
I don't wanna get carried away...

group_1.textRight: I think it's okay to be excited though.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, but...

group_1.textRight: I think that wearing a haregi is something very important to any girl...
...and I'm sure it would suit Sayaka too!

group_1.textLeft: But you see...

group_1.textRight: Sayaka in a haregi, huh? @Doesn't seem like your style...

group_1.textLeft: Shut up...@I got it already.
This conversation is over!
